name: Makeup Brush Cleaner Travel Set
about: What it is:.What it does:.This set contains:.What else you need to know:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..Dipping Method: ..-Pour, dip, and then wipe: these three easy steps are all it takes to clean makeup brushes. ..-Pour the Makeup Brush Cleaner into the Cleansing Tin enough to dip a quarter of the way up the brush bristles. ..-Dip brush tip into the liquid and remove immediately to avoid oversaturation. Bristles will draw liquid up into brush and dissolve away makeup. ..-For large fluffy or dense brushes, only dip 10 percent of the brush tip, and hold it vertically for five seconds so that liquid moves down into the base. ..-Wipe clean on an absorbent paper towel or cloth. Repeat as necessary. ..-Shape brushes and allow to air dry completely before using..... Precautions:..-Flammable: Keep away from open flame. ..-Do not swallow, and avoid contact with skin and eyes. ..-If swallowed, do not induce vomiting and seek medical attention. ..-Keep out of reach of children.

reviews.review_title: It does work, it does smell, use carefully
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the truth about this stuff. This will 100% clean your brushes and it's super convenient. You dip your brush into the tin about 1/4 of the way and quickly pull it out. Then just wipe it on a towel for a while, and it's dry in like 15 minutes. It's great at removing pigment, and I really love it. I only use it for eye brushes so a little goes a long way. Most of the downvotes on this product will be for the smell. Imagine what nail polish remover smells like and how it consumes all of the air. That's what this does. It smells like a heavy duty cleaner, which it is. It doesn't bother me, but if you have issues with fragrance, don't even try this product because using it will probably give you a headache.  Now, the only reason I didn't give this five stars is because every once in a while, some of my brushes dislike this product. I have sigma, BH, and colourpop brushes. The BH brushes really enjoy this stuff and do pretty well. Colourpop + sigma can be a bit more finicky. Every once in a while, I'll use this stuff and my brushes will be left stiff (like when you forget to soak a used paintbrush). However, this has happened less and less as I've used it. I think the key is to really ensure you are getting all the product off the brush when rubbing it on the towel (do little circles, really make sure it's off) and try to massage them a little while drying. Last time I used it, my fluffy colourpop brush splintered/stiffened a little and I was very unhappy. HOWEVER, I cleaned it again today and was much better about really just taking a minute to get all the product off. And now my brush is back to it's normal self, no more splintering, and it's softer and working much much better. So, just be diligent about your washing.

It needs only a tiny few drops and it's enough to soak a brush completely as per instructions.   My brushes were clean in seconds and I only needed to let them dry properly.   If you're sensitive to smell, this is going to be a con for you. The smell is strong but nobody is telling you to sniff the liquid.

After reading most of the reviews, I was pretty scared to buy this product; however I took a leap of faith with the travel size and found out the truth! So I tested the product and here are the true results....if you follow the directions and I mean to the T...you will love this product.  After you follow the cleaning directions, you will find that your brushes smell kind of like gasoline; however, your brushes are not truly dry. Let them dry over night. I washed over 20 brushes in less than 5 minutes before bed and let them dry over night. Next morning, my brushes are completely dry, the smell of gasoline is gone and they brushes are clean for my face.  I followed as directed and I did end up with one brush with a slight blue tint, but that was 1 out of 20. It may just be the type of brush hairs. Though if you want to try the results for yourself, you really can't go wrong with the travel size.  Hope my review was helpful. :)

reviews.review_title: Hands down Best on the Market!
reviews.review_text: I love for this cleaner because I invest so much money into my brushes and I feel the same level of investment (quality). I use this two ways the first way is in a spray bottle, but every time I purchase this product in the spray bottle packaging. (Same exact product) I use this to change colors or spot clean if it was a really dark color and needed to have it pigmentless and clean, but I also like using my Vira Mona sponge to dust of the excess.  I spray it directly on the top of the bristles and swipe until clean, it takes about 20 secs to dry. 2nd way using the tin, and dipping my brush 10 to 15% and it will soak up like a wike and sweep it on a soft towel or paper towel until it's back to brand new!

I like this product. The brushes do absorb the product quickly so be sure to follow the instructions, and DO NOT dip or French your brush. Just barely dip in the very top of your brush and it will pull plenty of product up into the bristles. I always be sure to keep my brushes facing down as to not allow the product to absorb into the glue that binds the bristles. I then use a clean washcloth to wipe the brushes back and forth until my brush is clean. I do rinse my washcloth clean with hot water afterward, and wring out excess water, then take my brushes again over the washcloth to remove the excess product left behind, because it can leave a powerful smell of a vanilla-ish alcohol type odor behind. I would not think that alcohol could be good for the brush as it may very the bristles out. By doing it this way,  my brushes get brand new looking and do not dry out. Hope this review helps.

Bought this as an impulse buy when checking out in store and I am so glad I did! Such a quick and easy way to clean my brushes! Love the tin it comes with so I don't have to dirty any of my own items, but it is on the small side so larger brushes may need to be washed in a different container. Overall, highly recommend.

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product, clean brushes fast and really well. But be careful about how deep you put your brush into the liquid because it causes damage to it, it can wash the glue that holds the bristles, I've lost one of my brushes while I cleaned. The other thing is that you need a lot of product to clean bigger and cream brushes. PS.: Sorry about my english, I'm not a native speaker.

This is ok if you don't have anything else but I wouldn't use this instead of actual soap and water. It leaves behind a film on the brush and it doesn't clean it all the way either. I tried on old brushes, new brushes that had been used two or three times, and I got the same result.
It turns your brushes blue & hardens all of your brushes. I do not recommend!!

It instantly dissolves makeup, but ruins my $50 It cosmetic brush in the process. it used to be nice and smooth, now since cleaning it is not putting my CC cream on smoothly and the bristles seems to be clumped together. not very happy
This smells like chemical but it works wonders I do recommend especially for you're a professional MUA

This is my absolute favourite brush cleaner! It has done such an amazing job cleaning my brushes and making them look as good as new again! I was blown away watching the dark eye shadow melt right off of my light blue eye shadow brush, returning the brush to its original blue colour. I have never used a cleaner which removed absolutely every scrap of makeup left on my brush. I will definitely be repurchasing this is the value size. If you're debating this product, just grab this travel sized one! It's a great price, so if you don't love it, it won't break the bank. But trust, you'll love it

Cinema Secrets is so easy to use! It cleans your brushes and within a few seconds your brushes are ready use again. 4 stars because this doesn't work well on large or dense brushes and you have to wash all of your brushes with other products after frequent use. This can't be your only brush cleanser.
This is the best item I purchased from Sephora. #VeryUseful

Pros:  -brushes smell like vanilla afterwards  -works very well to take off all makeup  -you don't need to scrub hard or anything the formula is amazing  Cons:  -for the price it's unfortunate because the brushes soak up a lot of product and I ran out so fast  -the scent is very strong at first I couldn't smell it directly from the bottle for so long because it made my eyes water -price /: I bought the travel size it lasted three weeks because I clean my brushes frequently    Overall if you wanna try it buy the$8 travel size JUST to try it! Only $8 it won't hurt  If you decide you love it like I did maybe u can justify buying the big bottle which is a good deal considering 32 ounces for $36 when $8 bottle is two ounces , for now I'll be saving up to buy the big bottle

I feel like every product there is people complain about the smell for some reason or another. This is fine and the smell doesn't linger on the brushes. Just a small tap in the cleaner and it soaks right in and a couple swabs on the paper towel and bam the brush is clean! Works on my powder, cream and liner brushes. Love this!

reviews.review_title: great formula; couldn't take the smell
reviews.review_text: the product does everything and smells like it is described but it was enough for me to return.  Bummed me out because it worked beautifully.  It' a great product if you aren't sensitive.

I adore this product! The first time I used it I was in awe. Yes it has a little bit of a strange smell, but on the box it does say it has a scent and that scent does fade on the brushes after a little bit. If you read the directions and use it properly it's perfection! I've read a few times that it's good for powder, but not for creams. I 100% disagree with that statement. I found a brush that I stopped using because it was still and scratchy from not being able to get the foundation completely out. I dipped it in this product, swirled it around on the paper towel, and wa-lah! The brush come completely clean. It's been a long time since my brushes have been this clean and it's all because of this! I've already ordered the value size.
Nothing like I've ever seen before! Works so good, my brushes dry so fast and look new. I will be repurchasing

This cleaner smells strongly of alcohol and my brushes absorb quite a bit of product but my brushes smell like vanilla afterwards and it's quite lovely. also cleans my brushes very quickly and I'm confident that my brushes are properly sanitized after use
Yes it cleaned your brushes, but the smells like alcohol.

reviews.review_title: make your brushes look new again
reviews.review_text: I hate to clean my brushes because it can take anywhere between 15-30mins depending on how dirty they are, this product cut that down to about 10 mins. I'm truly beyond impressed my brushes look brand new.
Absolutely love it! Cleanse very well. Defiantly will repurchase again.
cleans very very well BUT brushes soak up so much cleaner each time which wastes alot of cleaner so be careful
i love love love; it was super easy and mess free. the smell was good too. i will definitely be purchasing the full size.

I tried a travel size. The smell is not totally unpleasant, but very intense, especially first time. Maybe because it is smaller size tin, I found that for me it works the best on small brushes - eyeshadow, foundation, concealer, eyeliner and similar. I especially love it for foundation and concealer brushes, which are usually quite difficult to clean. The effect is stunning on lighter shade brushes' bristles. I am not so happy about big fluffy powder brushes with long bristles - it looks like the cleaner does not climb high enough to head, but maybe I will change my mind after buying a bigger size tin. I am definitely rebuying this in bigger size, but if I won't see a big difference for big brushes, I will look for additional cleaner for them.
Super easy, quick, makes brushes come out clean. It does have a rubbing alcohol smell but it doesn't both me. 100% recommend

I have spectrum brushes with white and pink bristles. This turned them blue. I washed immediately after using the brush cleaner but still ended up with blue tint. After using another brush cleaner for a few months the blue tint went away. That may not bother some, but for my  OCD, my white brush heads need to stay white. Lol
takes all the gross makeup out of my brushes. it does smell like chemicals but the scent doesn't linger on your brushes. and it drys instantly. overall it's great.

Wow been searching for a quick drying brush cleanser and hit jackpot with this gem! Quick drying and cleans really good; however, the smell is super strong when cleaning brushes, but the smell after is vanillA bean which I loveeeee

This product is so easy to use and you don't have to scrub anything. Just dip it and wipe the brush off a little, little to no work. I bought the travel size just to see if I'd like it and I love it. I plan on buying more of this product.
Best thing ever I need the jumbo bottle asap I didn't think it would work so well

When I came home with this and tested it out! I was instantly in love!! Cleans so fast! And u can use it right after! Plus it's very convenient. The smell is not to bad to me, maybe if your extra sensitive, all I smell is vanilla!
Brushes dry instantly ! I can clean my brushes right before using them and cleans my brushes to the point they look better then new !! Highly recommend!

I'm really glad they had this in travel size so I could try it before I got the bigger bottle. Yes it takes off the product and dries quickly but my gosh at the chemical smell! I'll use this until I run out but I don't think I'll buy the bigger bottle.

I picked this up trying to reach $25 and also some new brush cleaner.  I knew the reviews were good, but even when a cleanser has good reviews, I always find myself scrubbing just the same.   I needed to clean a brush quickly so I could share it so I poured a bit of this solution in the tin and dipped my brush in and instantly it absorbed the little amount of product I had used.  I blotted it down on a paper towel and like magic, my foundation literally melted onto the towel.   I did have to swipe it a few times, but I hadn't cleaned it in a while. This product is amazing.  It does have a strong smell.  But I don't mind, especially after seeing the results.

I bought this as a let's see how it does and I was shocked. My brushes were as clean as they day I bought them. One thing is read the instruction before using it. Just a dab does the job. Don't leave your brushes in the solution. Your brushes will suck up this solution. Just a fast in and out of the tin is all you need.  It does have a strong smell, but it's worth it when you see your brushes all clean and it didn't take all day to do it.

I definitely love this-- I am so lazy and can't be bothered to wash my brushes regularly. I bought this and it does what it claims and works great! It dries so quickly and removes all of the makeup. BUT-- there is a smell that many hate, but I don't mind. Also, if your brushes are white, it might leave a blueish tinge on the brush hairs.
this brush cleaner works wonders! a little definitely goes a long way and it dries instantly! the smell is not overpowering as most people have found it to be. but remember a little goes a long way!

At first the cleaning was great. Best brush cleaner I've ever used. Until 10 minutes later ALL of my bristles fell out! The cleaner loosened the glue in the base  & just tore it apart. Now I need a new brush set, just great!
I usually use brush shampoo but tried this out and wow! Really cleans your brushes so easily.  It does stink though so sometimes I use a little bit of shampoo quickly just to give it a better smell.

I bought this kind of on a whim, just to try it out. The pros: it does what it claims to do. Cleans your brushed FAST and dries very quickly, so the convenience factor is very appealing. The cons: The smell. Oh, God, the smell. It is a VERY strong synthetic vanilla, and it does NOT fade with time. Very unpleasant. I'll keep the rest of my bottle for emergencies, and I can see this being very convenient for some people, but the overpowering scent will prevent me from repurchasing.

I was skeptical about this brush cleaner. I bought the travel set at first before I bought a bigger size and let me say I honestly love this product. It cleaned off my foundation brush instantly! I was super surprised since it usually takes be a while to clean it off. It does have an intense smell to it but I feel like it really cleans all the bacteria from the brush instead of just using the Sephora solid brush cleaner I normally use. I wish the smell wasn't so intense but I would definitely purchase this again to clean off my brush and probably a bigger bottle. I say if you never tried it buy the travel set and see how you like it.

I bought a travel size (luckily) to try out. It REALLY stinks...it has a weird chemically scent to it and it didn't really clean my brushes very well.  I basically re-cleaned the brushes using baby shampoo just to try to get rid of the scent.    I'm not sure why this product has good reviews....unless there was something wrong with the one that I got??
This works great especially on oily make up. The odor is pretty intense, reminiscent of turpentine. There are equally good products out there, so I won't be buying this again.

This is the best brush cleaner around. I've tried a lot and nothing comes close. My foundation brushes are usually so hard to get perfectly clean. This did it in no time. The only down side is the smell. It's awful but doesn't linger around too long. It's such a good cleaner I can't knock a star of for the smell.

IMO there is not a better brush cleaner out there. I know many professionals that rave about this cleaner so I went out and purchased the travel set.  This will take the pigment out of any brush!  I tend not to dip my brushed but instead wet a paper towel with the cleaner and wipe my brushes in that until they are clean. You will save more product this way

First off the smell is strong at first but it fades to a nice vanilla scent, I read a lot of complaints about the strong chemical scent but I don't think it's an issue. I also don't think this is some amazing holy grail of brush cleansers, it doesn't take off all the make up as fast as people have said it does. It's just alright.

I really like this brush cleaner. I have used the spray In the past and while it is pretty good, this does a much better job of getting all the product out of the brush. Also you use a lot less of the cleaner to do it. Will definitely purchase this again.
This really cleaned my brushes so well. It will be a must for me now.
Cleans my brushes great, smells very strong but I can deal with it. Works great with my stylpro brush cleaner
wish would've bought the full size bottle. love the smell!! but it did turn one of my white brushes slightly blue
Cleans brushes so good but the smell makes me dizzy :(

This cleaned my brushes so well and made the process so easy! It smells like vanilla when you are done too. My only complaint is that the bottle wasn't made for pouring the cleaner in the tin and its easy to spill. Remember that this is only for cleaning your brushes you also need to condition them from time to time to keep them happy!

I hate cleaning my brushes, but this is super easy and took me all of 15 minutes to do about 15 brushes. My brushes, which I don't use daily, were surprisingly dirtier than I believed them to be, and they became soft and dry quickly. The smell, although strong, had a hint of vanilla. Will definitely buy again and continue using because it does a great job for a great price!

I've had this travel set for a while and tried it today and it's AH-mazing! If you hate cleaning your brushes like I do this product is so good. It's really quick at cleaning and it dries completely within seconds..i know there's a lot of complaints about the smell it personally doesn't bother me but then again I'm not overly sensitive to that's kind of stuff..so overall I highly recommend this product!
Super quick cleanser with minimal drying time. Love this stuff
Good value of the set. But the smell just can't be any worse! If I could I will give it 0 star
This stuff is so awesome, your brushes become brand new after using. They smell so pretty and are so soft and the process is so quick.

This brush cleaner travel set is my new all-time fave! It really works miracles melting off dried makeup from all types of brushes super fast and it dries quickly. If I want a quick clean in between my regular brush cleaning, this does the trick! My brushes were clean and soft after use. Great purchase and I highly recommend. It does have a strong smell, but the vanilla scent tones it down and you have to expect that this powerful cleaning agent will have a bit of a antiseptic smell. It's fine and I have no issues with that because it gets the job done!
This is a fantastic brush cleaner! Works so well, but has a strong-ish smell. Would definitely re-buy, especially for such a great price!
Wow works amazing!! I read the reviews and I am very happy I purchased it. Will definitely get a bigger bottle

Really good brush cleaner. I bought a travel size because I did not know if I would like it. However, buying the full size is completely worth it. Gets brushes extremely clean and still leaves them fluffy after air-drying. Product will make your skin dry when it touches, but just wash hands asap and you will be good :-)

this product makes brush cleaning really simple when you dont have time for a deep cleaning. I thought the bottle was gonna be bigger but obviously that was my fault for not reading the product description and assuming.
Hello this s*** this is amazing! Quickly dries, I'll keep buying this stuff for forever

Pleasantly surprised by this product.  It made cleaning my make up brushes a breeze while traveling for a few weeks.  A little bit of the cleanser goes a long way.  The only (potential) downsides are: 1) larger brushes can soak up a lot of product so you have to be aware of how much is in the tin when cleaning 2) the cleanser has a strong vanilla scent that LASTS.  The scent was fine for me but I know it could be troublesome for others.

reviews.review_title: Works really good! Need a bigger size.
reviews.review_text: If works perfectly! And it's fast drying. Currently need to get me a bigger size.

I struggle to get rid of foundation and concealer residue of my brushes cleaning with shampoo repeatedly and it still there so I bought this. I amazed with this just dip it and immediately my brushes are clean no residue. It does have an alcohol scent but goes away in a couple of minutes. I could use it for quick clean for the brushes I use that week before cleaning it in the weekend.

This works like magic! I hate cleaning brushes, but this made it so fast and easy.  If you don't have time to scrub them on a mat with brush shampoo, then get this.  It saves so much time! The tin is pretty tiny though, so, for me, I could only fit my eye brushes and blush brush inside.

reviews.review_title: Watch all the gunk magically disappear!
reviews.review_text: I'm not one to write reviews, but this product was so amazing that I created a username so that I could give it 5 stars. I'll start by saying I'm not a makeup junkie and prefer to keep what I own to a minimum, and this is a MUST HAVE. I've tried soap and water at home and some casual brush cleaner sprays, but I just can't be bothered to do anything requiring effort. This is so effortless, you just pour a bit of the cleaner into the tin, dip your brush in, wipe it off on a paper towel, and voila! I have an eyeshadow brush and I mostly use browns, and when I saw all that come off and that the tip was a bit pink, I thought maybe the cleaner dyed the brush, but nope, turns out that the tip used to be pink and I had completely forgotten. Get this. It's amazing.

I brought this product yesterday in the travel size area and took it home. I read the instructions and didn't think much about it, so today I decided to use and it was like magic. I cleaned my brushes day before using the DIY version with soap and some scrubbing materials. One of my brushes just would not clean, but when I used this today it removed all of makeup from the brush and I was amazed . I would definitely go back and but the full sized ( the bonus is the vanilla smell afterword )
Although they cleaned my brushes very well . The smell was too strong and I ended up getting a headache . Smells too chemically ???

I was incredibly shocked st the amount of makeup at pored out of my brushes after dipping my brush into the cleaner and finding it. The smell burned my nose. One of my brushes were ruined unfortunately I must have been too rough or something. Overall it did clean my brushes but the smell was so strong.

The product works really well at getting rid of product on my brushes, but it left my brushes feeling oily. My brushes would be soft, but it would feel like there was some residual oil from the cleanser. Also, the smell was a bit strong for me.  I would find myself reaching for another cleanser to get rid of the smell. I do like the tin. I use the tin for spot cleaning my eye brushes.

reviews.review_title: Not bad, but doesn't last long
reviews.review_text: Not a bad cleanser, but a lot goes a little way and the scent is fairly strong. Not my favorite cleanser, although I did like how quickly my brushes dried.

I didn't even know what I was purchasing obviously, because this stuff is amazing. I don't even know what I was expecting but it wasn't a product that worked so well, so fast and left my brushes smelling so good. You add a bit of the cleaner to the tin and dip a brush in, then wipe away on a towel. Wow. My brushes haven't been this clean in a long time and you can't tell when it's wet, but when your brushes dry they smell so good! I'll always buy this product. Don't know how I managed without it.

I bought the travel set and it worked great. I small dip and the cleanser pulled EVERYTHING out; nothing compare to washing it with soaps/cleaners. I do have to point out the small; I didn't notice the smell at first, but after brushing my 12th brush, the smell was soooooo strong and awful. Fortunately, the smell went away after drying. Also, I used up most of travel sized bottle, but only because I had cleaned 35-40 brushes with it.
Cleans brushes in a fraction of time, pleasant vanilla scent once dried, great for actual brush cleaning or when you're out & about working with 1 or more clients

I could not get past the disgusting scent! It smelled like a mixture of vanilla and gasoline ughh I had to throw my favorite foundation brush away because the smell lingered even after washing about 4Xs. If you love your makeup brushes stay FAR AWAY from this product.

It was quick to disintegrate all the built up makeup on my brushes but the smell was overpowering. Now that it is dry however,I noticethat my brushes have a slight perfume to them and the smell is pleasant.

This product is absorb by the brush quickly, start with a little amount in the tin and then I use a napkin to remove the excess, repeat if needed. This way you wont go through it too fast. But I do love it!! My brushes are clean, it's not messy, it's super easy, and they dry fast!! Will repurchase!
This cleaned my brushes really well but I went through 3/4 of the bottle in one cleaning. Also can't get past the smell and will not be repurchasing.

I'd seen this brush cleaner making the rounds on youtube and decided to purchase it, but I didn't want to sink almost $30 into a cleaner if I ended up not liking it so I bought the Travel Set that comes with the mini cleansing tin and a 2oz bottle of the cleaner.  The cleaner is great! I was shocked (and horrified...) at how much makeup it got out of my brushes. It restored the original white colour of my brush tips and even softened my eyeliner brushes that had gotten hard due to dried up product.  The cleanser tin on the other hand feels really cheaply made, and mine actually leaks when I use it (the product seeps through the bottom, I'm not sure how or why). So not only is it wasting the product, but it's also a waste of money.   I don't see any point in buying the tin, just pour a little bit out into a bottle cap and use that instead of paying additional money.  The major complaint I've seen is the scent, I didn't find it to be too intolerable and after it dries it leaves a perfumey vanilla scent. But it definitely smells like hand sanitizer at first.

This is the best brush cleaner currently on the market. I wish Sephora stores sold the largest bottle rather than it being an online exclusive. I love how this cleaner melts away all makeup left over on my brushes and dries so quick. I know the fragrant of the product is strong but I don't mind the scent at all. I actually prefer it. But i know some may not like it.
Love this. Hands down the best for cleaning your makeup brushes.
Great!! Cleans very well. Love the fact that it dries incredibly fast so you don't have to wait more than about an 45 minutes  to use brushes. I gave four stars because it uses so much product.
I absolutely love this product for changing eyeshadow colors! But I do not like the smell at all.
Quick an easy way to clean your brushes. But I wasn't crazy about it's smell.

reviews.review_title: Mr Wizard Meets Charles of the Ritz
reviews.review_text: I had a foundation brush that regular brush cleaner wouldn't touch. This stuff dissolved it in no time. I had so much fun that I went on to clean a blush brush and a couple of my eyeshadow brushes, including my blender. Could not believe how fast & easily these cleaned up. It's the best. Period.
Cleans brushes like nothing else. Perfect for right after use. I still like to thoroughly clean them once a week with soap cleanser but this is convenient and effective right after I use them.
The smell threw me off for a sec, but now, I think I will have to buy the large bottle. It cleans my brushes in seconds!!! the product residue just melts off. Great!!!

Bought this as a sample to try and will definitely be purchasing a full size. I had heaps of foundation stuck inside my dense real techniques expert face brush. I tried solid cleaners and scrubbing pads and could not get it out - one quick dip in this and it literally melted out. Uses a fair bit of product so will likely keep to my solid cleaners for easy to clean brushes I only use for powder products -but will keep this on hand for face foundation brushes for sure!!

So I bought a travel size of this to try since I have heard some good reviews. This stuff is amazing!! Now, I do have to say, after cleaning 2 foundation brushes - a real technique expert face brush and Cargo Magic Brush, the bottle is almost empty but I will be buying a full size for sure. This cleaned my brushes so well and smelled like Vanilla, they also dried super fast. Try it!!
Bought the travel set just to give it a try, I feel that it's not good for bigger brushes due to wasting more product, this is perfect for your eye brushes.

Bought the small one to try out this product and it works amazing. Got all of the makeup out of my brushes, and there is still basically a full bottle left, defiantly buying the bigger version when this runs out:)
I was very skeptical when I first opened it but once I used it I was wowed! I will definitely be buying the bigger bottle once I run out of this bottle.

To start off the metal container is too small for a lot of brushes (like the IT cosmetics brush) I guess because of the oil in the make up the cleaner doesn't get rid of the product in the brush. I ended up using Dawn and swirling the brush in my palm and rinsing with warm water to clean my brush, I will use this to cleanser for my smaller brushed only. Won't buy again.
Really does  a great job of removing makeup from the brushes. Im looking to buy a bigger bottle.
It cleaned my eye brushes sooooo well I was so impressed. Definitely need to buy a Bigger bottle.

reviews.review_title: it clean good but after smell no good
reviews.review_text: I wanted to try different brands to see which one is more quicker in cleaning and drying. This one did the job where it did clean my makeup brushes really good with no residue left behind on the towel and it did dry very quickly.   But the problem I am having is the smell that it left on the hair of the brushes. it's not a pleasant smell I find particularly fun. It reminds me of licorice together with cotton candy and as tasty as that may sound it's not something I find pleasant to have a perfume smell left on my brushes. If it didn't have the small this would've been my number #1 choice for makeup brush cleanser.   So it's a no go for me and I will not be repurchases this again.

I am surprised by how clean my brushes are! I initially had low expectations for this product, but it made one of my  brown brushes, white, I forgot that, this brush was white when I purchased it!   One advice I would give is that even though this product is fast drying, one should still wait a little longer for this product to completely dry before using it, to prevent breakouts and irritable skin.

I never write reviews, but i had to for this product. I love it! I have a set of brushes I never cleaned, and this cleaned them so well it made them brand new. I also just brought a white brush that I used this on, and it cleaned it almost all the way white again.
Brushes are clean, just don't leave in too long, or they tint blue.  Will repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Good way to try this cleaner
reviews.review_text: I heard good things about this brush cleaner, so when I saw this really affordable set I snatched it up!  Pros: easy to use, quick and effective Cons: the tin is smaller (some brushes don't fit), the cleaner smells like chemicals and not too pleasant, need paper towel/cloth to get off the excess cleaner solution on the brush

I like that it dries super fast and it does take off all the make up from my brushes the only think I don't like is the smell. It has a chemical vanilla scent it is kinda strong and i can smell it on my brushes besides that I can't complain

Good best used on smaller brushes. A face brush can use half the bottle to get clean! I do love the vanilla scent. It made brushes feel new! Good but cleaner didnt last through 2 washings of my main set of brushes... maybe I use to many. 1 face 1 blush 1 bronzer and 3 eye brushes.... they just soaked up the cleaner! But it does work just seems so expensive for only 2 washes...

This is the best brush cleaner I've tried. It does smell quite strongly but it not once it dries. It is amazing on my beauty sponges and really high density brushes. My only complaint is that the store didn't stock any larger bottles!
Easy to use brush cleaner! Keeps my brushes soft?
This product works so well. I will say that the scent is a little overwhelming. But it spot cleans makeup brushes very well and drys quickly.

This product was really affordable and made my brushes like they were brand new, no makeup on them whatsoever, but my brush still smells like vanilla after cleaning it over a month ago once. The liquid has a strong vanilla smell. If you like vanilla and want to smell it when youre putting on your makeup, then this is the product for you.
Makes cleaning brushes a breeze. Easy to use. It has become one of my must haves.

Other reviews have stated that there is a scent to this product. Usually I wouldn't mind, but this scent lingers even after I cleaned my brushes twice with other cleansers. It also left a weird film on the bristles of my larger brushes; the bristles developed an almost plastic feel to them, even after cleaning the brushes with another cleanser (the BB one).
This is the best brush cleaner known to mankind I love it so much

I love this cleaner! As anyone else who owns more than 10brushes, I hate cleaning them. This cleaner works fast and makes cleaning your brushes so easy! No more pruny hands. Also, it cuts down on drying time and really helps preventing damaging your brushes from getting water in the ferrule. It has a strong vanilla scent but fades and leaves a nice soft vanilla scent on your brushes. I will definitely be buying the larger size.

I honestly needed something small to get to $50 for free shipping. Ended up finding my new favorite brush cleaner. Seriously this stuff works and it works FAST! I like the vanilla smell so it definitely didn't bother me. Will be buying a giant bottle with my next purchase!

I bought this because I wanted the small tin for my small eye, brow and lip brushes and it works beautifully. I try to spot clean my brushes after each use and this cleaner is perfect for the job. Just a very small amount gets my brushes quite clean. It doesn't replace a deep cleaning but it sure makes it easier. If scents bother you be aware that the scent is quite strong.

This works pretty well, but has a really strong chemical smell, and I continue to smell it on my brushes after use. It works great for eye brushes, but anything you use liquid on, or bigger brushes, it doesn't clean as well.
Loved it. Will definitely repurchase larger size.  Smell is a little funky but manageable.
Definitely get what you pay for. It's a good amount for a sampler.

I love this brush cleaner. However, it was smaller than what I was expecting and it left a big of a blue tint on some of my brushes for some reason. I'm not sure if it's done that before because this isn't the first time I bought this product. But overall it cleans my brushes really fast and drys fast as well.

It's a travel size so of course you're not gonna get a lot ..it's meant to just get you by til your able to wash your brushes properly..but either way it's the best thing ever the smell is something that you can get over ...it really cleans your bushes I love this brand

The bottle was smaller than I expected, but it works wonders! It has a very strong smell so it takes some getting use to. Also since this is a travel size, this will last you about 1-2 uses depending on how many brushes you wash. One wash for all my brushes used half the bottle.
its a great product and works to get it clean but the bottle is so tiny then expected also the smell of it is terrible i had to rewash my brushes after i couldn't take the smell

I've never used a brush cleaner that works so quickly to slough off the product caked into my brushes. It had been a while since I did a good clean so I found myself using A LOT of product which is the one downside -- for the price I could be spending a lot to get a good clean. The vanilla smell is very nice!

It's good for what it is, I used it on my eye and face brushes today when I used it got them clean but it used the whole bottle to clean a few brushes, if I wanna keep using it I'm gonna have to get the bigger bottle.

I recommend this product to anyone that likes a deep clean in a shorter amount of time. I have acne prone skin so I used to shampoo and condition my brushes and then spray with rubbing alcohol. The alcohol would disinfect  and help with a quicker dry but would mess up my bristles. When I looked up best and quickest drying brush cleaners this came up in my search.   The way it is advised to be used does waste some product especially on smaller brushes so I only use the capillary method for my foundation brushes because they touch most of my acne prone areas. For the rest of my brushes like, lip, eyeshadow, brow, etc., I pour the cleaner into a spray bottle and directly spray the smaller brushes and swirl on a lint free paper towel. I haven't broken out from this product. It does have a strong chemical smell but it subsides after a while and becomes this vanilla-marshmellowy smell.   Placing this in a small spray bottle enables me to use the right amount of product, and keep all my brushes clean on-the-go.

This is the first brush cleaner I have ever purchased and I love it! It smells like a soft vanilla and it leaves my brushes feeling really soft. My only complaint is that it doesn't get out all of the foundation in my foundation brush. Aside from that, my brushes get clean almost instantly and that makes it easy for me to carry my brushes with me whenever I go on vacation or if I'm just going over to a friend's house. I also really like how fast the cleaner dries. As soon as I finish cleaning my brushes, they're dry and ready to be put away. Love! I would totally recommend.

This cleaning solution will CLEAN your brushes. I have never cleaned all my brushes so quickly. Honestly, it took all of ten minutes. Usually I have to rinse and swirl and soap and rinse and swirl and shampoo. Nope. Switching to this. Only cons are that I will need a much larger bottle of this as I went through more product than I was expecting for my first use (to be fair, I cleaned about 10 of my everyday brushes and one of them was a big ol kabuki). Also, the smell. It's not horrible, but it is a chemical smell, slightly sweet. I don't 100% mind, since it is the smell of intense cleaning, but I hope it doesn't stay in the brush after it dries. Will switch to this for sure regardless. Buying the full size, gonna save the little one for my makeup bag

I've been looking into this product for a long time and decided to bite the bullet when I saw the travel size one at my local Sephora right before check out. I immediately opened it up and tried it out when I got home and I was not disappointed. It works as easy as reviews say it does, but it does have a weird, medicine like scent to it.   The cleanser immediately took the pigment out of my brushes leaving it very clean with little residue. I don't think it's possible to immediately use it after a cleanse, but it did feel dry. I would definitely wait a little while.

Honestly I was expecting the bottle to be a bit bigger but it works amazing. The problem I have with this product is the smell! It's too strong and it made me want to rewash my brushes just to get the smell off. It also made one my favorite brushes shed! :(
This stuff is simply amazing. Cleans so quickly and just almost as fast. Will be buying a huge bottle when mines is almost out!

I was looking for a makeup brush cleaner, and this was recommended by a friend (who happens to be a makeup junkie!!).  This stuff is amazing!!! Easy to use, smells great, and cleans brushes so quickly!   Best brush cleaner I have ever used.

I have tried a variety of brush cleaners as it is cheaper than buying new brushes and I like expensive brushes. This is the best product I have ever tried. I cannot believe all the makeup that came off my brushes and I clean my weekly. The smell is a bit strong for my taste but its bearable. You literally fin the tin, dip and wipe. It is very quick drying. I used 1/2 of the contrainer on 20 brushes. The brushes feel like new. I will be buying the full size when I am done.

This is such a good brush cleaner and it gives the brushed an amazing vanilla smell after it dries, I used like half of this bottle though after I cleaned all of my 30-40 brushes. The tin is also really tiny and bigger brushes take a lot of product so I clean my bigger brushed with a different cleaner so I don't waste product. Really amazing and would definitely recommend this
This is a great product. I got a sample and it cleaned my brushes quickly and dried fast. I immediately ordered a full size and will keep this on hand always.
Does a good job! Love the mini tin!
